title: Jax AA animation bug
body:
When jax gets his 3rd auto (ult passive) the wrong animation plays, and when he attacks towers his ult animation (passive ult anim)  does not stop playing (and its playing the wrong one). and as far as i have tested it this bug does not affect game play as i dont think his ult passive supposed to apply extra damage to towers, but if it does then its not working

EDIT:
I have found that this varrys depending on the skin you use. The idle anim also likes to play while you stand still and AA

replies.body:
Hey StillJustKyle! 

Thanks for the report! I'll be looking into this today. We actually updated his AAs this patch (7.10), however, it resulted in a couple bugs, namely his (E), that we'll have fixed up again next patch. Sorry for the inconvenience there. ;_; Lemme know if the AAs are still off in the current patch! :)
Havent noticed anything funky, and im am really happy you guys decided to update his AAs. When i read the patch notes i got really happy :D
Excellent! Glad you're digging the changes! :)
